review: This device CONSTANTLY loses the network connection and once it does there is absolutely no way, short of unplugging it and plugging it back in to reload the home page. Even when the network shows as CONNECTED with a strong signal, it will NOT reload the home page. The fire stick has a lot of good features but this horribly annoying trait has made me very reluctant to move on to the Fire TV. This is just bad design, plain and simple.
